meanings.sent1: The unenterprising student rarely volunteered to answer questions in class.
meanings.sent2: She was considered unenterprising because she never pursued any new opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The unenterprising squirrel refused to try the new acorn diet.
meanings.sent4: His unenterprising nature was like a ship without a sail, drifting aimlessly.
meanings.sent5: The unenterprising clouds hung lazily in the sky, not moving an inch.

meanings.definition: Not showing willingness to undertake new projects or take risks.
meanings.sent1: The unenterprising employee always avoided taking on challenging tasks.
meanings.sent2: Her unenterprising attitude held her back from exploring exciting opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The unenterprising cat refused to try the new toy, sticking to its old ways.
meanings.sent4: The unenterprising river flowed steadily, never daring to carve a new path.
meanings.sent5: His unenterprising behavior was like a locked door, shutting out any chance of progress.
